content.p: Associate Professor of Management Accounting, Faculty of Social Sciences Hung is Associate Professor of Management Accounting at NUBS Malaysia. Prior to joining the University of Nottingham Malaysia in 2001, she has practical experience in management accounting and internal auditing. Hung is a Chartered Accountant registered with the Malaysian Institute of Accountants and the Chartered Institute of Management Accountants, UK, and a member of the Chartered Global Management Accountants. She is also a fellow member of the UK Higher Education Academy. Hung specialises in management accounting for teaching and training. She has taught various accounting modules at both undergraduates and masters levels, and is currently focusing on management… read more Hung has been involved in research in the areas of management accounting practices for quality management and sustainability performance management.
